name: Moonflower: Fae's Rest Epilogue
storyline:
High Alchemist Nika Skylar has succeeded! The Moonflower lives and the Advisor Zekial has been brought to justice.

But at what cost?

One year has passed since the events of the Moonfaire. The king gone, an ancient debt paid, a scheme shaken loose.

On High Alchemist Nika Skylar's return to the Kingdom of Ashmire he finds the palace a much different place to what he left behind. His work far from done, Skylar is faced with an opportunity he dared not hope possible, the opportunity to travel and return home.

The opportunity to reunite with his eternal love.

Continue the story of Moonflower in this after story epilogue. Pick up one year after the events of the 'Moonflower and Cat' ending.

The Moonflower may be saved by Skylar and Ender's love story doesn't end there.
summary: The Moonflower is saved, but the love story burns bright. Continue the love story of Skylar and Ender in this epilogue after story.
